question: Tower of Victory ‚Äù or Vijay stambh in Rajasthan is located in
explanation: The Vijaya Stambha is an imposing victory monument located within Chittor Fort in Chittorgarh, Rajasthan dedicated to Vishnu. The tower was constructed by the Mewar king, Rana Kumbha, in 1448. It is to commemorate his victory over the combined armies of Malwa and Gujarat led by Mahmud Khilji.
